amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal Section 3102, which reauthorizes the Market Access Program (MAP) until 2018.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to repeal Section 3102, which reauthorizes the Market Access Program (MAP) until 2018.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 322 (Roll no. 263).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 322 (Roll no. 263).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Chabot.
